subject: [Radiance-general] Re: Upgrading to R4: "There were some errors."
body:
Mark, Jack, & Thomas,

Thanks for the tips! I tried adding the libx11-dev and csh packages, but
it still didn't work. So I (gave up and) grabbed Jack's compiled version
from his ftp site, copied the files to the right places, and it now
reports 4.0 as the version for rtrace and rvu.

I'm hung up a new error though, rtrace reports that it can't find
"inglas.cal". Does that sound familiar to anyone? It could be a file one
of my german colleagues made that I lost in the process, but
unfortunately they've all gone home for the day already...

Thanks again,
Cramer
--
